note: Singer-songwriter duo Clymer & Kurtz seamlessly blends intense and gentle melodies textured with harmonies, agile and inventive guitar playing, and (usually) light percussion. Based in the Shenandoah Valley of Virginia, their music is at once subtle and imaginative, simple and rich. Singer Maria Clymer and guitarist Christopher Kurtz have honed their collaborative songwriting for decades, crafting emotional depth from a remarkable array of styles into a sound uniquely their own.
